channel.title: Grabscape | New server | Kiln cape | comp cape | New Updated Torva
channel.description:
Hello, We are a project that I and few friends have been working on, we are a 24/7 server but we do not have a VPS just yet, waiting untill we have about 15+ players, and get a few donations, but as soon as we can, we will be geting a VPS,we have been working on this project for a few months off and on, and we are ready to build our players! We have good friendly staff that do their jobs correctly and never abuse or ask for passwords!
Website: www.grabscape.com
Current Forums: www.grabscapeforums.createaforum.com
Server Features: All Skills working (Hunter, Summoning,Dungeoneering, and a PKING SKILL!) 100% Working Emotes, including skillcapes! Easy Money Making ( Thieveing or Hunter) Fast Xp Rates with double xp weekends! Bosses Include, King BLack Dragon Tormented Demons Corp Beast Giant Mole Dagg Kings God Wars Sea Troll Queen Nomad Lakhrahnaz Giant Sea Snake Avatar of Destruction Giant Mole Barrelchest Minigames Include: Pest Controll Duel Arena Warrior's Guild Barrow's (UnderGround) 20 Wave Jad! Great Pking Place's Mage Bank Varrock PK (Multi) Lava Crossing Edgeville Green Dragons Funpk Nex Armour Primal Armour All Special attacks working! Downloadable Client Working Hope to see some of you there! Here are some Pictures! [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/mli4it.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/14ig9oi.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/j7fg5k.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2m5e0kk.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/241paut.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2hd457p.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/34659jb.png[/img]
Come on and stop by guys! We need players!
Website: (downloadable client on website for download)
www.grabscape.com
Forums: www.grabscapeforums.createaforum.com
Owner = Rex Co-Owner = Mod Jebus
Credits: Thanks to, Rex Mod Jebus

item.description:
@p3rdue wrote:

Hello, We are a project that I and few friends have been working on, we are a 24/7 server but we do not have a VPS just yet, waiting untill we have about 15+ players, and get a few donations, but as soon as we can, we will be geting a VPS,we have been working on this project for a few months off and on, and we are ready to build our players! We have good friendly staff that do their jobs correctly and never abuse or ask for passwords!

Website:
www.grabscape.com

Current Forums:
www.grabscapeforums.createaforum.com

Server Features:
All Skills working (Hunter, Summoning,Dungeoneering, and a PKING SKILL!)
100% Working Emotes, including skillcapes!
